div.p: Adverse event tracking in clinical care and clinical research settings can differ. In the former case, the event is tracked to meet business safety concerns and incident reporting. There is a strong interest in how the event was resolved. In the clinical research setting, the event is additionally tracked to be considered as a concern for participation in the research study, since the occurrence of an adverse event may surface a potential confounder or a potential side-effect of the study treatment. For Clinical Care or Clincial Research, the Vulcan accelerator project suggests two profiles on AdverseEvent Resource.
